pages.title: Kamen Rider Juuga
pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Revice (2021, TV show)$(br2)Transforms with the $(l:revice/devices/juuga_driver)Juuga Driver$(/l)$(br2)Status Effects:$(li)Punch VII$(li)Strength X (with empty hand)$(li)Strength IV (with weapon)$(li)Speed IV$(li)Resistance IV$(li)Water Breathing$(li)Night Vision$(li)Haste III$(li)Jump Boost
